card.name: Ballyrush Banneret
card.property: Kithkin spells and Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only wool from the side of the springjack turned most often to the sun can be woven into kithkin battle standards. Jackherds record every movement of their woolly-jacks until shearing.

card.name: Battletide Alchemist
card.property: If a source would deal damage to a player, you may prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of Clerics you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not heal. Healing means that the pain has already been felt. To stop suffering, one must prevent the world's wounds altogether."

card.name: Burrenton Bombardier
card.property: Flying Reinforce 2—{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

card.name: Burrenton Shield-Bearers
card.property: Whenever Burrenton Shield-Bearers attacks, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Soul and bones, kithkin are woven into their clans. They fight fiercely and without self-interest.

card.name: Cenn's Tactician
card.property: {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The choke point was the plan, but devoted camaraderie was always her strategy.

card.name: Changeling Sentinel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's nothing more unsettling than locking blades with something that looks just like you.

card.name: Coordinated Barrage
card.property: Choose a creature type. Coordinated Barrage deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.

card.name: Daily Regimen
card.property: Enchant creature {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What self-indulgence tears down, discipline builds up again.

card.name: Feudkiller's Verdict
card.property: You gain 10 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, create a 5/5 white Giant Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are all kinds of strengths, but if you have strength of soul, the others will follow." —Galanda Feudkiller

card.name: Forfend
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Suddenly there stood a fortress protecting the clachan, its walls hewn of valor and mortared with honor." —Clachan Tales

card.name: Graceful Reprieve
card.property: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."

card.name: Idyllic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If one's life is blessed, solutions to all life's problems will appear at the right moment." —The Book of Kith and Kin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Odum and Broadbark were the only beings mighty enough to challenge the giant Moran the Destroyer. Their battle lasted a hundred dawns, until Moran became so exhausted that he fell into namesleep. He awoke as Moran the Gardener." —The Tale of Odum and Broadbark

card.name: Kinsbaile Borderguard
card.property: Kinsbaile Borderguard enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Kithkin you control. When Kinsbaile Borderguard dies, create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token for each counter on it.

card.name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
card.property: Knight creatures you control have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

card.name: Kithkin Zephyrnaut
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Kithkin Zephyrnaut, you may reveal it. If you do, Kithkin Zephyrnaut gets +2/+2 and gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Meadowboon
card.property: When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls. Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Mosquito Guard
card.property: First strike Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His aim is as sure as a mosquito's sting, but with none of the warning.

card.name: Order of the Golden Cricket
card.property: Whenever Order of the Golden Cricket attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should you take it in mind to ride a springjack, remember: there are easier ways to fly, and harder ways to break your skull." —Lann of Cloverdell

card.name: Preeminent Captain
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Preeminent Captain attacks, you may put a Soldier creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you need an example to lead others to the front lines, consider the precedent set."

card.name: Redeem the Lost
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Redeem the Lost to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Reveillark
card.property: Flying When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Shinewend
card.property: Flying Shinewend enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Shinewend: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Stonehewer Giant
card.property: Vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

card.name: Stonybrook Schoolmaster
card.property: Whenever Stonybrook Schoolmaster becomes tapped, you may create a 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merrow schools rarely form by design. They come together naturally as eager learners surround the wisest teachers.

card.name: Swell of Courage
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. Reinforce X—{X}{W}{W} ({X}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tideshaping is more than creating a few new puddles."

card.name: Wandering Graybeard
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wandering Graybeard, you may reveal it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His tales are as tall as he is, and only a giant's life is long enough to listen to them all.

card.name: Weight of Conscience
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. Tap two untapped creatures you control that share a creature type: Exile enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the weight of the world on your shoulders is a literal one.

card.name: Declaration of Naught
card.property: As Declaration of Naught enters the battlefield, choose a card name. {U}: Counter target spell with the chosen name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every story, even a faerie tale, comes to an end.

card.name: Dewdrop Spy
card.property: Flash Flying When Dewdrop Spy enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in dew from Oona herself is there clarity enough to see a victim's mind.

card.name: Disperse
card.property: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gryffid scowled at the sky. A perfect day for the hunt tainted by clouds. He wished them gone. High above, the clouds looked down, scowled, and made a wish of their own.

card.name: Distant Melody
card.property: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

card.name: Fencer Clique
card.property: Flying {U}: Put Fencer Clique on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You may as well try to swat a faerie —Flamekin expression meaning "that's impossible"

card.name: Floodchaser
card.property: Floodchaser enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Floodchaser can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Floodchaser: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

card.name: Grimoire Thief
card.property: Whenever Grimoire Thief becomes tapped, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library face down. You may look at cards exiled with Grimoire Thief. {U}, Sacrifice Grimoire Thief: Turn all cards exiled with Grimoire Thief face up. Counter all spells with those names.

card.name: Ink Dissolver
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Ink Dissolver, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Inspired Sprite
card.property: Flash Flying Whenever you cast a Wizard spell, you may untap Inspired Sprite. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Knowledge Exploitation
card.property: Prowl {3}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.) Search target opponent's library for an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Latchkey Faerie
card.property: Flying Prowl {2}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Faerie or Rogue.) When Latchkey Faerie enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

card.name: Merrow Witsniper
card.property: When Merrow Witsniper enters the battlefield, target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world above the waterline must be monitored—and, when necessary, adjusted."

card.name: Mind Spring
card.property: Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

card.name: Mothdust Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Tap an untapped creature you control: Mothdust Changeling gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ever seen a changeling fly into a lantern?" —Calydd, kithkin farmer

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

card.name: Nevermaker
card.property: Flying When Nevermaker leaves the battlefield, put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library. Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Notorious Throng
card.property: Prowl {5}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.) Create X 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn. If Notorious Throng's prowl cost was paid, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Research the Deep
card.property: Draw a card. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Research the Deep to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Sage of Fables
card.property: Each other Wizard creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no secret that cannot be sold."

card.name: Sage's Dousing
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Curse these merrows and their meddling! Since coming near the river, I can't so much as sneeze without being soaked." —Ashling the Pilgrim

card.name: Sigil Tracer
card.property: {1} {U}, Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The reflection is true. It is you who are distorted and false."

card.name: Slithermuse
card.property: When Slithermuse leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference. Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Stonybrook Banneret
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Merfolk spells and Wizard spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made from trout scales and crawfish whiskers, merrows' shimmering banners flash in the water like lightning.

card.name: Stream of Unconsciousness
card.property: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreams are tempting because one is so powerful in them. Dreams are dangerous because that power is a lie.

card.name: Supreme Exemplar
card.property: Flying Champion an Elemental (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elemental you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

card.name: Thieves' Fortune
card.property: Prowl {U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.) Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.property: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

card.name: Waterspout Weavers
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Waterspout Weavers, you may reveal it. If you do, each creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Auntie's Snitch
card.property: Auntie's Snitch can't block. Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.) Whenever a Goblin or Rogue you control deals combat damage to a player, if Auntie's Snitch is in your graveyard, you may return Auntie's Snitch to your hand.

card.name: Bitterblossom
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

card.name: Blightsoil Druid
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."

card.name: Earwig Squad
card.property: Prowl {2}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.) When Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Fendeep Summoner
card.property: {T}: Up to two target Swamps each become 3/5 Treefolk Warrior creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is drowned is not forgotten. I will fulfill my oath. Come back to me, my brethren, as I have come back for you."

card.name: Festercreep
card.property: Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

card.name: Final-Sting Faerie
card.property: Flying When Final-Sting Faerie enters the battlefield, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many heroes' last sight is a grin at the other end of a rapier.

card.name: Frogtosser Banneret
card.property: Haste Goblin spells and Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Frogtossers thread feathers, bones, and trophies from past raids into their standards, believing they fuel the warren with the anger of its victims.

card.name: Maralen of the Mornsong
card.property: Players can't draw cards. At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player loses 3 life, searches their library for a card, puts it into their hand, then shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Maralen sent Veesa, Endry, and Iliona—the Vendilion clique—on the gravest of tasks.

card.name: Mind Shatter
card.property: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

card.name: Moonglove Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {B}: Moonglove Changeling gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

card.name: Morsel Theft
card.property: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.) Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. If Morsel Theft's prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

card.name: Nightshade Schemers
card.property: Flying Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Nightshade Schemers, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Noggin Whack
card.property: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.) Target player reveals three cards from their hand. You choose two of them. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Offalsnout
card.property: Flash When Offalsnout leaves the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. Evoke {B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Oona's Blackguard
card.property: Flying Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Pack's Disdain
card.property: Choose a creature type. Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each permanent of the chosen type you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like the sun to a flower, the adoring gaze of the tribe is sustenance to an elf. To be shunned is to wither.

card.name: Prickly Boggart
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even without the spines, who would dare to touch it?" —Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

card.name: Pulling Teeth
card.property: Clash with an opponent. If you win, target player discards two cards. Otherwise, that player discards a card. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Revive the Fallen
card.property: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Revive the Fallen to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Scarblade Elite
card.property: {T}, Exile an Assassin card from your graveyard: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rejoice, eyeblight. In your last hours above the earth, those who bury you will finally make you beautiful."

card.name: Squeaking Pie Grubfellows
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Squeaking Pie Grubfellows, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Stenchskipper
card.property: Flying At the beginning of the end step, if you control no Goblins, sacrifice Stenchskipper.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many believe it to be the manifestation of all that is vile about the boggarts. I believe it should be avoided—from upwind, if possible." —Cenn Deagan

card.name: Stinkdrinker Bandit
card.property: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.) Whenever a Rogue you control attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Violet Pall
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A faerie is the offspring of Oona and mischief.

card.name: Warren Weirding
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature. If a Goblin is sacrificed this way, that player creates two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens, and those tokens gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And that's when it was discovered that boggarts have just half a brain." —The Book of Other Folk

card.name: Weed-Pruner Poplar
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target creature other than Weed-Pruner Poplar gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When Byoog reached down to pull up a bit of root for the stew, he didn't expect the root to pull back." —A tale of Auntie Wort

card.name: Weirding Shaman
card.property: {3} {B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Create two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All boggarts have an auntie, but they don't all have a mum.

card.name: Boldwyr Heavyweights
card.property: Trample When Boldwyr Heavyweights enters the battlefield, each opponent may search their library for a creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even if giants bring nothing else on a journey, they bring attention.

card.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
card.property: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

card.name: Borderland Behemoth
card.property: Trample Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giants share nothing but their fury.

card.name: Brighthearth Banneret
card.property: Elemental spells and Warrior spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Reinforce 1—{1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The banner symbolizes the goodwill of the Brighthearth. Their emissaries bring the mastery of fire to other races.

card.name: Countryside Crusher
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your graveyard and repeat this process. Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Countryside Crusher.

card.name: Fire Juggler
card.property: Whenever Fire Juggler becomes blocked, clash with an opponent. If you win, Fire Juggler deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Hostile Realm
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lorwyn's crust explodes with power when the greater elementals are born. The flamekin use the fallout as cover for forays into enemy territory.

card.name: Kindled Fury
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All beings carry the fire inside them. The challenge is to unleash it before they dwindle into oblivion." —Illulia, flamekin soulstoke

card.name: Lightning Crafter
card.property: Champion a Goblin or Shaman (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Goblin or Shaman you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) {T}: Lightning Crafter deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Lunk Errant
card.property: Whenever Lunk Errant attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One's plenty," observed the merrow. "Way too plenty," agreed the boggart.

card.name: Mudbutton Clanger
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Mudbutton Clanger, you may reveal it. If you do, Mudbutton Clanger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pyroclast Consul
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Pyroclast Consul, you may reveal it. If you do, Pyroclast Consul deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Rage Forger
card.property: When Rage Forger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Shaman creature you control. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, you may have that creature deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Release the Ants
card.property: Release the Ants deals 1 damage to any target. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Release the Ants to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Rivals' Duel
card.property: Choose two target creatures that share no creature types. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They could agree on one thing only: one of them must die.

card.name: Roar of the Crowd
card.property: Choose a creature type. Roar of the Crowd deals damage to any target equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One voice is but a pebble to the rest of the world. A thousand voices at once is an avalanche.

card.name: Seething Pathblazer
card.property: Sacrifice an Elemental: Seething Pathblazer gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flamekin death rites are elaborate and spectacular affairs. Their greatest fear is death in obscurity." —Tollek Worldwatcher, journal

card.name: Sensation Gorger
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Sensation Gorger, you may reveal it. If you do, each player discards their hand, then draws four cards.

card.name: Shard Volley
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Shard Volley deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the mountain's teeth pierce our oppressors."

card.name: Shared Animosity
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the nature of souls that they burn more brightly together than apart." —Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

card.name: Spitebellows
card.property: When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature. Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

card.name: Stingmoggie
card.property: Stingmoggie enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {3}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Stingmoggie: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A path vexed by the stingmoggie was probably the wrong path anyhow.

card.name: Stomping Slabs
card.property: Reveal the top seven cards of your library, then put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If a card named Stomping Slabs was revealed this way, Stomping Slabs deals 7 damage to any target.

card.name: Sunflare Shaman
card.property: {1} {R}, {T}: Sunflare Shaman deals X damage to any target and X damage to itself, where X is the number of Elemental cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spark to light the guttered heart.

card.name: Taurean Mauler
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

card.name: Titan's Revenge
card.property: Titan's Revenge deals X damage to any target. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Titan's Revenge to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Vengeful Firebrand
card.property: Vengeful Firebrand has haste as long as a Warrior card is in your graveyard. {R}: Vengeful Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flame of a warrior is never extinguished.

card.name: War-Spike Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {R}: War-Spike Changeling gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aren't there boggarts enough in Lorwyn? Couldn't it turn into a sheep? Or a sunflower?" —Olly of Goldmeadow

card.name: Ambassador Oak
card.property: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

card.name: Bosk Banneret
card.property: Treefolk spells and Shaman spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in a murmuring bosk, where the trees' memories span centuries, the simple banner of green and copper signifies an elder whose rings number more than a faerie's days.

card.name: Bramblewood Paragon
card.property: Each other Warrior creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who seek to escape her blades succeed only in dying on their stomachs.

card.name: Chameleon Colossus
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Protection from black {2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Cream of the Crop
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's power. If you do, put one of those cards on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Deglamer
card.property: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more pleasant an illusion's garb, the more indecent its form laid bare.

card.name: Earthbrawn
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Reinforce 1—{1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gremil finally felt in touch with nature—and felt a need to share the experience with others.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.

card.name: Everbark Shaman
card.property: {T}, Exile a Treefolk card from your graveyard: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you rise again, from seed to sapling to sentience."

card.name: Fertilid
card.property: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.

card.name: Game-Trail Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I pity them, never knowing the pleasures of a single familiar form, but at least they find a noble shape at times." —Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

card.name: Gilt-Leaf Archdruid
card.property: Whenever you cast a Druid spell, you may draw a card. Tap seven untapped Druids you control: Gain control of all lands target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In our hands, the natural world finds more beauty than nature alone could ever provide."

card.name: Greatbow Doyen
card.property: Other Archer creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever an Archer you control deals damage to a creature, that Archer deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Heritage Druid
card.property: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Study the great spirits of our age and those of the past. Prune secrets from the branching traceries of our lineage." —Twila, Gilt-Leaf archdruid

card.name: Hunting Triad
card.property: Create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens. Reinforce 3—{3}{G} ({3}{G}, Discard this card: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eyeblights are easy to track. Just follow the imperfections."

card.name: Leaf-Crowned Elder
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Leaf-Crowned Elder, you may reveal it. If you do, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Luminescent Rain
card.property: Choose a creature type. You gain 2 life for each permanent you control of that type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storms in Lorwyn don't patter on village rooftops, but rather drench the clachan in rays of amber light.

card.name: Lys Alana Bowmaster
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may have Lys Alana Bowmaster deal 2 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Orchard Warden
card.property: Whenever another Treefolk creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After the Rising, a treefolk's mind is as limber and green as its limbs, and is at its most receptive to our teachings."

card.name: Reach of Branches
card.property: Create a 2/5 green Treefolk Shaman creature token. Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Reach of Branches from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Recross the Paths
card.property: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Recross the Paths to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Reins of the Vinesteed
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. When enchanted creature dies, you may return Reins of the Vinesteed from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to a creature that shares a creature type with that creature.

card.name: Rhys the Exiled
card.property: Whenever Rhys the Exiled attacks, you gain 1 life for each Elf you control. {B}, Sacrifice an Elf: Regenerate Rhys the Exiled.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a famed hunter and packmaster, now a renegade seeking his own path.

card.name: Scapeshift
card.property: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Changes far greater than the turning of the leaves await us at season's end." —Colfenor, the Last Yew

card.name: Unstoppable Ash
card.property: Trample Champion a Treefolk or Warrior (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Treefolk or Warrior you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +0/+5 until end of turn.

card.name: Walker of the Grove
card.property: When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token. Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Winnower Patrol
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Winnower Patrol, you may reveal it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Winnower Patrol.

card.name: Wolf-Skull Shaman
card.property: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wolf-Skull Shaman, you may reveal it. If you do, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A chorus of howls answers his call.

card.name: Cloak and Dagger
Diviner's Wand
Door of Destinies
card.property: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

card.name: Obsidian Battle-Axe

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's the flint that sparks a warrior's rage.

card.name: Thornbite Staff
Veteran's Armaments
Murmuring Bosk
card.property: ({T}: Add {G}.) As Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Treefolk card from your hand. If you don't, Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Murmuring Bosk deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Mutavault
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some changelings born at Velis Vel never return, but their essence never leaves.

card.name: Primal Beyond
card.property: As Primal Beyond enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Elemental card from your hand. If you don't, Primal Beyond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or activate an ability of an Elemental.

card.name: Rustic Clachan
card.property: As Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Kithkin card from your hand. If you don't, Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
